page.title: 15HEATHROW AIRPORT
page.content: HEATHROW AIRPORT IS VERY NEAR CRANFORD JUNIOR SCHOOL ,ONLY ABOUT TWO AND A HALF MILES AWAY.LOTS OF PARENTS OF THE CHILDREN THAT GO TO CRANFORD JUNIOR SCHOOL WORK AT THE AIRPORT.MOST OF THEM WORK FOR BRITSH AIRWAYS AND PAN-AM.THE MAIN JOBS ARE CATERING,TRANSPORT AND CLEANING. THERE IS A LOT OF POLLUTION IN CRANFORD FROM THE AEROPLANES AND THE AIRPORT.WHEN THE PLANES GO OVER CRANFORD THEY MAKE A LOT OF NOISE.IN THE SUMMER PEOPLE WHO LIVE IN CRANFORD HAVE TO OPEN THEIR DOUBLE GLAZED WINDOWS AND SO THE NOISE GETS IN. THE PEOPLE WHO WORK AT THE AIRPORT SOMETIME S GET FREE FLIGHTS ALL OVER THE WORLD.IT IS QUITE INTERESTING LIVING NEAR THE AIRPORT BECAUSE YOU SEE PLANES AND PEOPLE FROM ALL OVER THE WORLD.SOME PEOPLE DO NOT LIKE LIVING IN THIS AREA BECAUSE OF THE
